author: rpopma
msg: LOG4J2-639: prevent NPE if AsyncLogger/AsyncLoggerConfig is used after log4j was shut down

author: rpopma
msg: performance improvement: added surefire plugin with reuseForks=true to override parent setting of reuseForks=false (speedup: from 22 to 10.5 seconds)

author: rpopma
msg: performance improvement: changed from reuseForks=false (old setting: forkMode=always) to reuseForks=true (about 8 seconds faster)
